homepage.meta.title.message: Mmuae ka fael a wɔde aka ho

homepage.meta.description.message: Thunderbird Add-on: Mmuae a ɛka fael a wɔde aka kan no ho

homepage.hero.title.message: Mmuae ka fael a wɔde aka ho

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Ka fael a wɔde aka kan no ho bere a wubua asɛmmisa wɔ Thunderbird mu—otomatik anaa akyinnyeɛ‑kakra ansa.

homepage.whatsNew.desc.message: Ken nsakrae foforo a etwa to no wɔ {changelog} mu.

homepage.features.autoConfirm.body.message: Paw ntam: ka‑ho otomatik anaa akyinnyeɛ‑kakra mpɔtam bi a ɛwɔ 'keyboard' kwan ntɛm‑ntɛm pa.

homepage.features.dedupe.body.message: Bu fael a wɔde aka dedaw so, na siw mmɔ‑bio fa fael‑din so; ho tew na ɛteɛ.

homepage.features.skipSmime.body.message: Woyi SMIME nsain ne mfonini a ɛwɔ krataa no mu firi ho de ma mmuae no ntew.

homepage.features.blacklist.body.message: Glob‑nhwɛsoɔ a ɛmmfa nkyerɛwee kɛse anaa ketewa ho, te sɛ {code1} anaa {code2}, siw fael a ɛnni hia ka ho.

homepage.search.tip.message: Afotu: Mia {slash} anaa {ctrl}+{k} na hwehwɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ no.

site.title.message: Mmuae ka fael a wɔde aka ho

site.tagline.message: Thunderbird Add-on: Mmuae a ɛka fael a wɔde aka kan no ho
